name: Proof of Anon
description: In today's interconnected society, privacy is not a privilege but a basic right. However, this essential personal freedom is alarmingly under attack. Here comes Proof of Anon's avant-garde toolkit for enhanced anonymity. Powered by the omnipresence of Big Data, numerous entities - ranging from governments and tech giants to healthcare institutions - collect, dissect, and misuse vast amounts of personal information for their advantage. Merging well-known protocols, and battle-tested encryptions, we aim to give people a seamless interaction that provides a high-end experience.
